name: product_category_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool real_time_amazon_data.
Tool description: Fast and Simple product searches, data and reviews on Amazon.com in real-time.
API description: Fetches the list of Amazon product categories for a specified country or marketplace.

country.description:
Sets the marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP`
